text: Meting railway station (, Sindhi: ميٽنگ ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located in Meting village, Thatta district of Sindh province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Thatta District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Meting railway station
